title: karuNa ElaagaNTE
sahitya:
karuNa ElAgaNTE nI vidhamE kalyANasundara rAma



anupallavi



paramAtmuDu jIvAtmuDu yokaDai baragu cundu bhakta parAdhInuni



caraNam 1



A nrtam bADaDu alpula vEDaDu su nrpula kolavaDu sUryuni maravaDu



caraNam 2



mAmsamu muTTadu madhuvunu drAgaDu parahimsala sEyaDu Erukanu maravaDu



caraNam 3



mUDI sanamula vADaDu jIvan muktiDai tirugu mudamunu jUpaDu



caraNam 4



vancana sEyaDu varulatO bonkaDu cancala cittuDai saukhyamu viDuvaDu



caraNam 5



sAkSiyani delisi andu lakSyamu viDuvaDu kanjAkSuni tyAgarAja rakSakuDaina

vAni
